welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kigoma, Tanzania! Known for its beautiful lakeshore, lush landscapes, and vibrant culture, we invite you to immerse yourself in the charm of this city and explore all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Ally's Restaurant
restaurants.description: Ally's Restaurant is a african restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kigoma Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kigoma Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
